examples: He wore a suit to the meeting.
She put on her best suit for the interview.
Ele usou um terno para a reunião.
Ela vestiu seu melhor terno para a entrevista.

suggested: Why did the businessman wear a suit to the beach? So he could make a good 'impression'
The suit lay crumpled in the corner, a reminder of the job he didn't get.
He was so angry that his suit was wrinkle, he couldn't even think straight.
The suit was made entirely out of recycled materials, a surprising choice for a formal event.
The smell of freshly pressed suit.
The feeling of the smooth fabric of a well-tailored suit.
The connection to professionalism and success when wearing a suit.
